rules_text:
First strike, haste 
Whenever Noah attacks, exile up to one target card in a graveyard controls with mana value less than its power with a fate counter on it. If you exile a card named Mio this way, exile Noah, then meld them into Noah and Mio, Fated Off-Seers.
If you are stagnant, you may play cards with fate counters on them from exile. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Double strike, vigilance, haste
You may play cards with fate counters on them from exile.
Whenever you cast a card from exile, Noah and Mio, Fated Off-Seers gets +X/+0 and trample, where X is that cards mana value.
Whenever Noah and Mio, Fated Off-Seers deals combat damage to a player exile the top card of their library with a fate counter on it.
